sentence: In her race for the Senate, Barnette calls her three fellow Republicans who recently moved into the state to run – Dave McCormick, Carla Sands and Mehmet Oz – "carpetbaggers," and then she adds, "We don't need to send another rich person to D.C. to represent our interests.
title: Kathy Barnette Hopes To Become US Senate's First Black Republican Woman

sentence: Pennsylvania Republican Senate candidate Dave McCormick said that the state's working families "are being terribly damaged by the policies of the Biden administration" Friday on "The Story with Martha MacCallum."
title: Working families 'being terribly damaged' by the Biden administration: Dave McCormick

author: Jonathan Tamari
title: Dave McCormick has dropped millions into Pa.'s U.S. Senate race, but it's hard to trace where it's coming from

sentence: In a heated campaign for an open Senate seat, Oz’s opponent, Dave McCormick, called on Oz to renounce his dual citizenship and questioned why Oz didn’t serve in the U.S. military.
author: Liz Skalka
title: Mehmet Oz Says He'll Give Up Dual Citizenship If Elected To Senate

sentence: "The bigoted attacks my opponent Dave McCormick has made against me as the child of immigrants are reminiscent of slurs made in the past about Catholics and Jews," Oz said.
author: Alex Rogers and Michael Warren
title: Dr. Oz vows to renounce Turkish citizenship if elected to Senate

sentence: Dr Oz had been under fire from a primary opponent, Dave McCormick, who charged that he could not serve in the upper chamber of the US legislature if he held “dual loyalties”.
author: Andrew Feinberg
title: Dr Oz reverses course on keeping Turkish citizenship if elected to Senate

sentence: “I maintained it to care for my ailing mother, but after several weeks of discussions with my family, I’m committing that before I am sworn in as the next U.S. senator for Pennsylvania I will only be a U.S. citizen.” Oz called the attacks from his primary opponent, Dave McCormick, “bigoted,” likening it to a time when Americans rejected Jews and Catholics.
author: Blarp Blog
title: Dr. Oz Flip Flops on Turkish Citizenship, Now Says He Will Renounce It if Elected

sentence: During the Pennsylvania Republican Senate primary debate forum, frontrunner Dave McCormick, saying that everyone should be held accountable for their past statements, confronted the celebrity doctor about his anti-fracking history over the years on his shows and in columns he has written.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Mehmet Oz Has Meltdown During Live Debate When Confronted With Record, Called ‘Liberal’
